title: Stan Kenton - 18 Original Big Band Hits (1962) Hindsight
description:
STAN KENTON & HIS ORCHESTRA PLAY 18 ORIGINAL BIG BAND HITS (1962)

1. Hold In Reserve [1:03]
2. Four Of A Kind [3:52]
3. The Blues Story [3:40]
4. I Understand [3:55]
5. Between The Devil And The Deep Blue Sea [4:37]
6. Siesta [3:39]
7. I'm Glad There Is You [3:57]
8. Mission Trail [3:19]
9. Night At The Gold Nugget [3:50]
10. Peanut Vendor [3:53]
11. Fitz [3:58]
12. Mellophobia [4:00]
13. All The Things You Are [3:48]
14. Hold In Reserve [1:03]
15. Limehouse Blues [4:00]
16. Waltz Of The Prophets [4:12]
17. Tonight [4:18]
18. Artistry In Rhythm [4:00]

Recorded in 1962

No personnel info

1987 Hindsight Records

"These tracks are not reissues of old Capitol records. Wally Heider engineered each cut for big 16-inch electrical transcriptions financed by the U.S. Air Force Reseve program. Some of the tunes had been, or were later, recorded by Stan for the Capitol label but there are major differences in the duplicated titles."
